PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-06602024-06-10IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Immigration Loans Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (IMMIGRATION LOANS PROGRAM) in order to set the maximum amount of advances from the Consolidated Revenue Fund for the Immigration Loan Program from $300 million to $400 million.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0127 Publication Date: 2024-06-19
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (IMMIGRATION LOANS PROGRAM) in order to set the maximum amount of advances from the Consolidated Revenue Fund for the Immigration Loan Program from $300 million to $400 million.
